title: Unranked looking for players
body:
Hey guys since the new season I have been putting off ranked games because of my experiences in the past but am keen to climb again. 
Currently unranked with 700+ wins i'm just seeing if there is anyone else out there that is not keen to have feeders and afk's ruin their promos - 
JG/TOP/SUPPORT looking for people to play ranked with :)

replies.body: I play Supp and I'm looking for someone good to duo with. I'm unranked and broze 4 last season. I just couldn't be bothered playing with the feeding adcs that blame me whenever I played ranked but now I wanna try again. And same as IhakaNZ I wouldn't mind doing ranked teams either.
Im keen if your making a team im B5 about to go into B4 i carry all games but team has no focus and throws hardcore so id be keen for some decent players to team with.

Sounds good bro

I wouldn't mind starting a team either, especially to climb

I'm keen to play with you!
Bronze 3 at the moment, but carrying alone is hard, help me?

Add me if you're keen

Hey, I'm alsoing looking for a duo partner!
Your perfect for me :D (Not gay btw, if your getting this all wrong)

I play all lanes (Yes, all lanes)
Add me if you wish :D

P.S: Bronze 4 this season (not really 'exciting') 
        Silver 5 pre-season (2015)
